FuncDef:
The mld max-response-time command sets a global maximum response time for Multicast Listener Discovery (MLD) Query messages.
The undo mld max-response-time command restores the default value.
By default, the maximum response time for MLD Query messages is 10 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum response time for MLD Query messages.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 125, in seconds.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The maximum response time determines the period during which the device quickly checks whether there are directly connected members in the LAN.
If the maximum response time is configured in both the interface view and the MLD view, the system prefers the value configured in the interface view.
